name: Sir Lamorak's Quest: The Saving Of Sir Lamorak
name_original: Sir Lamorak's Quest: The Saving Of Sir Lamorak
description:
Explore Castle Egremont as the brave Sir Lamorak!

Trek through the castle, evading monsters, destroying things with your bouncing axe, solving puzzles, and trying to not die a horrible death.

As you play, your health gradually starts to drop, meaning you will have to search for health pickups as you explore, causing it to be even worse when monsters damage you.

Find the keys needed to escape, dodge the monsters, and try to not die before you can get out.

Sir Lamorak's Quest!   Play it now!

developed 2020

released 2021
